title: Sunny and no precipitation - weather forecast in Georgia until December 22 - Pravda Georgia
text:
Sunny and no precipitation – weather forecast in Georgia until December 22
Sunny and no precipitation – weather forecast in Georgia until December 22.
There will be no precipitation in Tbilisi, the temperature will be +10 degrees.
The weather will be clear in the coastal regions of the country (Batumi, Kobuleti, Anaklia, Poti), with temperatures rising to +16 degrees.
In Western Georgia (Kutaisi, Zugdidi, Ozurgeti) there will be no precipitation, the air will warm up to +12 degrees in the afternoon.
In the regions of Shida Kartli and Kvemo Kartli, everything is the same, the air temperature will be up to +10 degrees.
Mostly no precipitation is expected in the mountainous regions of Eastern Georgia, with daytime temperatures of +8 degrees.
